name: Awlspan Syandana
description: Bring forth the look of your inner beast.

languages.description: Stellt das Aussehen eures inneren Biests zur Schau.
languages.name: Awlspan Syandana

languages.description: Faites ressortir le style de votre bête intérieure.
languages.name: Syandana Awlspan

languages.description: Fai emergere lo stile della tua bestia interiore.
languages.name: Syandana Awlspan

languages.description: 내면에 존재하는 짐승의 모습을 드러내어 보세요.
languages.name: 올스팬 샨다나

languages.description: Revela la apariencia de tu bestia interior.
languages.name: Syandana Awlspan

languages.description: Проявите внешне ярость вашего внутреннего зверя.
languages.name: Сандана: Оулспан

languages.description: Revele a aparência da sua fera interior.
languages.name: Syandana: Awlspan

languages.description: 帶出你內心猛獸的樣貌。
languages.name: 錐翼披飾

languages.description: ดึงสัตว์ร้ายที่อยู่ข้างในตัวคุณออกมาให้เป็นรูปเป็นร่าง
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Awlspan

languages.description: Покажіть усім вигляд свого внутрішнього звіра.
languages.name: Сяндана «Шилокрил»
